title: Crooked Cove
description: Our parents sent me away because they're terrified that I'll corrupt their only daughter.They should be.I've returned for summertime on the cove.My restraint is hanging by a thread.All it takes is one taste and I'm hooked.I'm the monster under her bed and her saving grace all rolled into one.And I'll stop at nothing to claim what's mine.
author: Rory Ireland
